notes.subject: Mechanics
notes.description: Centrifugal pumps are commonly used for pumping water, solvents, organics, oils, acids, bases and any 'thin' liquids in both industrial, agricultural and domestic applications.

notes.subject: Computer Science
notes.description: Web design refers to the design of websites that are displayed on the internet. It usually refers to the user experience aspects of website development rather than software development.

notes.subject: Mathematics
notes.description: In numerical analysis, Newton's method, also known as the Newtonâ€“Raphson method, named after Isaac Newton and Joseph Raphson, is a root-finding algorithm which produces successively better approximations to the roots of a real-valued function.
